content.query:
--CREATE DATABASE Covid19

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'public_pandemicdatalake_blob_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [public_pandemicdatalake_blob_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://pandemicdatalake.blob.core.windows.net/public', 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bingdata (
	[id] int,
	[updated] date,
	[confirmed] int,
	[confirmed_change] int,
	[deaths] int,
	[deaths_change] smallint,
	[recovered] int,
	[recovered_change] int,
	[latitude] float,
	[longitude] float,
	[iso2] varchar(8000),
	[iso3] varchar(8000),
	[country_region] varchar(8000),
	[admin_region_1] varchar(8000),
	[iso_subdivision] varchar(8000),
	[admin_region_2] varchar(8000),
	[load_time] datetime2(7)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'curated/covid-19/bing_covid-19_data/latest/bing_covid-19_data.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [public_pandemicdatalake_blob_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT top 10
 *
FROM
bingdata




SELECT
    country_region as Region, AVG(Confirmed_change) as AverageDailyConfirmedCases, AVG(Deaths_change) as AverageDailyDeaths
FROM
bingdata
	group by country_region
	order by AverageDailyConfirmedCases desc


SELECT
    country_region as Region, SUM(Confirmed_change) as ConfirmedCases, SUM(Deaths_change) as Deaths
FROM
bingdata
	group by country_region
    order by ConfirmedCases desc


SELECT top 10
    country_region as Region, MAX(Confirmed_change) as AverageDailyConfirmedCases, MAX(Deaths_change) as AverageDailyDeaths
FROM
bingdata
	group by country_region
    order by AverageDailyConfirmedCases desc



SELECT top 10
    country_region as Region, SUM(Confirmed_change) as ConfirmedCases, SUM(Deaths_change) as Deaths
FROM
bingdata
	group by country_region
    order by ConfirmedCases desc
